Jinshi Yu

jinshi.yu@foxmail.com

Github

I’m Jinshi Yu and is currently pursuing the ph.D degree with the Faculty of Automation, Guangdong University of Technology, Guangzhou, China. My research interests include nonnegative matrix factorization (NMF), tensor decomposition, tensor completion and machine learning. I am currently working with Prof. Guoxu Zhou, and if you are interested in our work, welcome to join in our lab.

Education & Experience

  • 2009.9 - 2013.6   Bachelor in Department of Automation   Zhongkai University of Agriculture and Engineering
  • 2015.10 - 2016.1   Student Intern   LABSP, RIKEN Brain Science Instutute, Japan
  • 2018.7 - 2019.1   Student Trainee   TLU, RIKEN Center for Advanced Intelligence Project, Japan
  • 2017.9 - now   PhD in Department of Automation   Guangdong University of Technology
